mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_BOARD(TITLE, CONTENT, FILEPATH, FIX) VALUES(#{title},#{content},#{filePath}, ${fix})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE_BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, FIX=${fix} WHERE NO=#{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY NO DESC

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() rownum, no, title, content, regdate, fix, filepath from notice_board where fix = true order by regdate desc ) as one union all select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() rownum, no, title, content, regdate, fix, filepath from ( select * from notice_board where fix = false order by no asc ) as three order by regdate desc,rownum desc limit ${listSize} offset ${startList} ) as two

select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() rownum, no, title, content, regdate, fix, filepath from notice_board where fix = true order by regdate desc ) as one union all select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() rownum, no, title, content, regdate, fix, filepath from ( select * from notice_board where fix = false and title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by no asc) as three order by regdate desc,rownum desc limit ${listSize} offset ${startList} ) as two
select count(*) as listCnt from notice_board
select count(*) from notice_board where TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%';
